•	Successful managed the Supply Chain Planning initiative to include expected returns into the Planning algorithms resulting in a cost savings of $1 million annually.

•	Accomplishment in the last year has been to help business transition from single 3PL Vendor to a Multi-Vendor model incorporating B2B.
